extendedInfo.description: The Chef PiÃ±eiro app is a Multimedia Recipe Book by one of the most famous chefs of puerto rican cuisine, Chef Enrique PiÃ±eiro. This TV Personality has distinguished himself as one of the most re-known chefs in Puerto Rico and has a bachelors degree in Culinary Arts Managment, from the prestigious Culinary Institute of America in Hyde Park, New York. Chef PiÃ±eiro worked for a year at the Michelin Guide Three Star Restaurant "El Raco de Can Fabes" with Chef Santi SantamarÃ­a at Barcelona, Spain. This app places at the hand of the user exclusive gourmet recipes for poultry, red meats, fish and sea food, vegetables, side dishes and desserts. It also includes a section for children to cook with their parents called "Cocinando con MamÃ¡" and presents a special selection of fine wines chosen by Chef PiÃ±eiro himself. Each recipe includes its ingredient list and preparation instructions and and allows the user to save the ingredients list of any recipe of interest for later review, vote for the recipe to show how popular it is and lets the user add personal tips to each recipe for other user to see. The app also allows the user to share recipes on Facebook, Twitter or via email. The app includes videos of recipes preparation, video tips for better cooking and step by step audio recipes all by Chef PiÃ±eiro, as companion to the recipes. This application is a definite most have, for all who love cooking and love the taste of delicious puerto rican gourmet food. * Push Notification used in this app for news and updates.

reviews.title: Super bueno!!!!
reviews.comment: Hay un pequeno error en la receta de spaguettis con pollo dice 2cdas de oregano molido pienso que deberia decir 2 cdtas por que le eche lo que decia y es demasiado oregano. Por lo demas esta buenisiiiimo ahora voy a cocinar mas saludable. Mil gracias Chef!!!!!!
